channel.title: Supremescape (reborn)
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]Welcome to SupremeScape![/SIZE] SupremeScape had some unfortunate luck as the both the VPS and Webhosting companies suspended both of our accounts for hacking/phising activities, this happened for an unknown reason. So we had to buy a new webhost and VPS. Hours of coding was spent into the server before that happened and we are constantly working to provide everyone the same, but even better experience. So if anyone has ideas or things that were not re-added notify an owner for whatever it is back! We would love a lot of support to get SuspemeScape off it's feet and back to were it was! We will be bringing everyone much more content with regular updates, we listen to the players and we care. Come join the community by joining the Forums at [url=http://supremescape.com/forums/]SupremeScape[/url]
Sincerely, SupremeScape Developers [CENTER] [SIZE=5] Supremescape 718 Features[/SIZE] -24/7 vps hosted -daily updates -25 skills working -prestige system -28 bosses -8 minigames -4 quests -custom home -loyalty points -veteran rank -dicezone -chillzone -active pk -stable economy - Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har'lakk ) -friendly staff -free yell -double exp weekend -Classic Player
[COLOR="#00FF00"]Donators benefit[/COLOR] donatorzone bank command 2 donator boss 5 donator shops +1.2 exp rate
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Extreme Donator benefit[/COLOR] all donators benefit plus 1 extreme boss 3 extreme shops +1.5 exp rate
And much more to discover in the world of Supremescape
Skype: khen15 / kenneth papango website: [url=http://supremescape.com/]SupremeScape[/url] Download client [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!4EBFzIhQ!gFtBxy4cramllxHPWuDE2y8xvXBxncLAH72vf_4GnVw]https://mega.co.nz/#!4EBFzIhQ!gFtBxy4cramllxHPWuDE2y8xvXBxncLAH72vf_4GnVw[/url] webclient: [url=http://supremescape.com/webclient.html]http://supremescape.com/webclient.html[/url]
Ongoing Updates Developing Supremescape 718 Developing Website
Launching this week Supremescape 317
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K7ZDdOWKbQc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][b]Custom Home[/b]
[spoiler][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/34fehpl.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[b]25 skills working[/b] [spoiler][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/qy7hup.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[b]28 bosses[/b]
[spoiler][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2w66tqw.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[b]Credit[/b] Jake for Freedomx Source[/CENTER]

item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

[SIZE=4]Welcome to SupremeScape![/SIZE]
SupremeScape had some unfortunate luck as the both the VPS and Webhosting companies suspended both of our accounts for hacking/phising activities, this happened for an unknown reason. So we had to buy a new webhost and VPS. Hours of coding was spent into the server before that happened and we are constantly working to provide everyone the same, but even better experience. So if anyone has ideas or things that were not re-added notify an owner for whatever it is back! We would love a lot of support to get SuspemeScape off it’s feet and back to were it was! We will be bringing everyone much more content with regular updates, we listen to the players and we care. Come join the community by joining the Forums at SupremeScape

Sincerely, SupremeScape Developers
[CENTER]
[SIZE=5]
Supremescape 718 Features[/SIZE]
-24/7 vps hosted
